reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its great fit, comfort, and quality, with one noting it doesn't feel cheap at all. They appreciate its softness, beautiful material (95% rayon), and pockets that are big enough to hold a phone. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect for their height, others say it runs a bit long.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfortable
items.body: This dress is super cute and comfortable. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù and ordered a medium. It fits well and is long enough. I like that the material is very light, buy not cheap looking since I live in the Southwest. I bought it for vacation to a conservative country, but I plan to wear this one a lot. The skirt is a different fabric and not clingy. Love this dress. Read more
items.author: AZ canyonhiker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful style
items.body: Beautiful fabric and well made. Love the fit. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect comfortable dress!
items.body: This dress is beautiful!! I got this to wear to a wedding and it was so flowy, soft, and comfortable! I love that it has pockets. The shipping was so fast! I will definitely be getting a few more in different colors/styles! I also love that it‚Äôs long sleeve! True to size as well! Read more
items.author: Lisa Marvin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but long
items.body: I really like this dress. It's soft, a little stretchy, and comfortable. It appears to be a good quality of material and craftsmanship. It feels good on. It is long, I have to hem it about 1.5 - 2 inches. Even with my highest heels, it's too long. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 stars. It's one solid color, green. Sweaters and jackets along with jewelry will give this dress a dressy or casual look. It does run true to size (except for length), or it did for me. I do recommend this dress if you can hem it or know someone who can. Read more
items.author: Debbie C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This dress is so soft and comfortable and so pretty--I got two compliments on it from random strangers the first time I wore it! One caveat: I am 5'1" and it's floor length for me to the point where I'm going to hem it up about 3 inches so I don't have to worry about tripping on it. Great length for tall women though!! Read more
items.author: Tracy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable!! Mine had a hole in it though!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! The fit, the look, extremely comfortable, but after I got it on I realized it had a hole in it which sucks! Don‚Äôt want to return it but don‚Äôt want it to have a hole in it either üòû Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: When I first tried this on it seemed too tight in the bust. The elastic that was supposed to be the waste was actually just below my bust line And it seemed too tight. So I almost returned it but I decided to wear it around the house for a while and I did for about two or three hours. I then took it off and thought about returning it but when I put it back on it‚Äôs seem to fit perfectly except for the length. Is about 4 inches below my ankle so I am going to half to hem it. Expected it to be too long and If you don‚Äôt have a sewing machine you it will have to deal with this problem si just especially it. My bust measures 42 inches and it is snug but it actually fits really well. The fabric is very stretchy but when it stretches of my bust line it is not too tight. I think we can all expect this to be too long and that‚Äôs just the way it is. It came in perfect condition and well protected when it was shipped and all the shipping instructions were followed perfectly. The fabric is soft and the color is beautiful. I ordered the purple one and it is exactly like the picture. There was no bad odor and there has never been a bad Oder with any product I‚Äôve ordered from Amazon. I would be surprised though if this ever fit anybody To the waistline. I think it has a short waist. I think hitting me just below the bustline is very flattering. The length of the sleeves is a little long but it doesn‚Äôt look that way when I‚Äôm wearing it. After wearing it around the house for a couple hours The wrinkles fell out of the Fabric completely. This is a beautiful product and I will probably order it in many other colors. I will probably wash it in cold water and dry it in a cool dryer. Read more
items.author: Letha

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Flowers Black White, Blue Dianthus, Trumpet Black, Black Flowers White, Flowers Blue Green, Gray Azalea, Army Green, Flowers Wine Red, Black, Blue Flowers White, Polka Dot White Navy, Flowers Brown Black, Lemon Black, Polka Dot White Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
